verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
He is always there
Hearing ev'ry prayer
faithful and true

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
Walking by our side
in His love we hide
all the day through

verse.name: c1c
verse.lines:
When you get discouraged
just remember what to do

verse.name: c1d
verse.lines:
Reach out to Jesus
He's reaching out to you

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
Is your burden heavy
as you bear it all alone?

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Does the road you travel
harbor danger yet unknown?

verse.name: v1c
verse.lines:
Are you growing weary
in the struggle of it all?

verse.name: v1d
verse.lines:
Jesus will help you
when on His name you call

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
Is the life you're living
filled with sorrow and despair?

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
Does the future press you
with its worry and its care?

verse.name: v2c
verse.lines:
Are you tired and friendless
have you almost lost your way?

verse.name: v2d
verse.lines:
Jesus will help you
just come to Him today.
